Package xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.subcmd

Class PubTokenSubCommand

java.lang.Object
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.subcmd.PubSubCommand
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.subcmd.PubSubCommandWithArgs
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.subcmd.PubTokenSubCommand
public final class PubTokenSubCommand extends PubSubCommandWithArgs
A subcommand that configure given repository URL token that using for publish.
Since:
1.0.0

  • Constructor Details

    • PubTokenSubCommand

      public PubTokenSubCommand(@Nonnull PubTokenSubCommand.TokenAction action, @Nonnull String hostedURL)
      Construct subcommand option for given hostedURL.
      Parameters:
      action - Pending action when executing this command with hostedURL.
      hostedURL - Target of repository URL.
      Throws:
      IllegalSubCommandArgumentException - This constructor does not apply for PubTokenSubCommand.TokenAction.LIST and throw it instead.

    • PubTokenSubCommand

      public PubTokenSubCommand(@Nonnull PubTokenSubCommand.TokenAction action)
      Construct subcommand option without specific hostedURL applied.
      Parameters:
      action - Pending action when executing this subcommand.
      Throws:
      IllegalSubCommandArgumentException - When applying PubTokenSubCommand.TokenAction.ADD which must require given URL.
